annotations.description: It was an attractive offensive game and the fans have no reason to be upset. You have to say that the visitors have been the better side. The home team adopted a defensive style of play, while the away team tried to prevail using combination football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Lionel Messi (Barcelona) slams home the penalty with a precise low shot into the bottom left corner.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) is going to take the penalty!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Aymen Abdennour (Valencia) is penalised.

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: A clumsy foul by Aymen Abdennour (Valencia) and Alberto Undiano Mallenco blows his whistle. PENALTY! One of the players from Barcelona is about to take a penalty kick.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 2 min. of stoppage time to be played.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) whips in the resulting set piece but it's cleared.
Aymen Abdennour (Valencia) makes a slide tackle, but referee Alberto Undiano Mallenco blows for a foul. A free kick has been awarded to Barcelona.
Munir El Haddadi (Valencia) shoots from the edge of the penalty area. The ball travels low towards the middle of the target, but Marc Andre ter Stegen easily deals with the threat.
Eliaquim Mangala (Valencia) gets to the rebound and shoots, but the effort is blocked.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting set piece from Valencia is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.
Santi Mina (Valencia) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Valencia.
Luis Suarez (Barcelona) wins himself enough space to connect with a cross inside the box, but his fine header goes narrowly over the crossbar!
Neymar (Barcelona) has a shot blocked from inside the box.
Close! Nani (Valencia) picks up the ball in space and from inside the penalty area sends a shot inches wide of the left post.
Neymar (Barcelona) fails to deliver a decent cross from a long range free kick. The opposition's defence intercepts the effort.
Luis Suarez (Barcelona) strikes the ball harmlessly from a long range free kick and it goes high over the bar. It's not easy to score from a distance like that.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Alberto Undiano Mallenco shows the yellow card to Enzo Perez (Valencia) for a heavy challenge.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Lionel Messi (Barcelona) is the one who receives a yellow card.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Luis Enrique has decided to substitute Andre Gomes and he is replaced by Denis Suarez (Barcelona).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The game has come to an end for Rodrigo. He has contributed as much as he could today. He will be replaced by the fresh legs of Santi Mina (Valencia).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) blazes a shot from a long range free kick and the ball ends somewhere in row Z.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Mario Suarez (Valencia) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Alberto Undiano Mallenco didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) sends a promising through ball, but the defence is alert and cuts out the pass.
The Barcelona players keep the ball and are exchanging a combination of passes. They are waiting for gaps in the defence to open up.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Luis Suarez (Barcelona) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball into the right side of the goal. It's 2:2.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) wins himself just enough space inside the box to connect with the corner. His header flies towards the left post, but the goalkeeper dives superbly to stop the effort.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The referee points to the corner flag and Barcelona will take a corner.
Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender.
Another attempt to send the ball beyond the defence by Daniel Parejo (Valencia) is thwarted and cleared to safety.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Rodrigo (Valencia) changes the scoreline after getting on the end of a brilliant pass and firing a precise shot that goes inside the right post!

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Daniel Parejo (Valencia) takes the resulting corner which is well defended.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Munir El Haddadi (Valencia) shows perfect technique and produces a first time effort from just outside the box that goes into the bottom right corner. It's 1:1.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Neymar (Barcelona) sees a yellow card from Alberto Undiano Mallenco after he sent one of the opposing players to the ground.
Flag up against Rodrigo (Valencia). He had space to move into behind the defence, but he went too soon.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) is angry with himself. The ball breaks to him but he hits the right post!
Diego Alves hears the fans clapping his superb goalkeeping. Neymar (Barcelona) shoots from the edge of the box towards the bottom right corner, but the goalkeeper makes a magnificent save.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Booking. Lucas Digne (Barcelona) receives a caution from the referee.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Cesare Prandelli has made a change at the break. Munir El Haddadi (Valencia) has come on in place of Martin Montoya.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The whistle blows and Alberto Undiano Mallenco starts the second half.

There was certainly plenty of action during that opening 45 minutes. The visiting team dominated the first half in most aspects of the game, but the hosts will surely attempt to turn the situation in their favour. The home team tries to find the weakness in the opposition's defence, especially with rapid counter attacks, while the away team play possession football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Alberto Undiano Mallenco has ended it.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) has a great chance to score from deep inside the box! He finds some space for the shot, but sends it errantly way past the left post. Very poor attempt.
Lucas Digne (Barcelona) is flagged for offside.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 2 min. of added time.

Daniel Parejo (Valencia) runs with the ball towards the keeper and pulls the trigger from close range, but Marc Andre ter Stegen anticipates his intention and makes an amazing save to stop the shot going low into the middle of the target.
Some great controlled play and passing from Barcelona. They are increasing their possession of the ball and trying to open up the opposition's defence to hit them swiftly on the break.
Alberto Undiano Mallenco interrupts the game for a tactical foul by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Nani (Valencia) pulls the trigger and strikes the ball towards goal from long range, but his effort is blocked by one of the defenders.
Excellent touch by Luis Suarez (Barcelona)! He latches on to a precise pass deep into the box and produces a low drive towards the right post. The goalkeeper pulls off a beautiful save to deny him.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Aymen Abdennour (Valencia) in, Jose Gaya out.
Luis Suarez (Barcelona) latches on to a precise pass and one on one with the keeper slams the ball towards the left hand post. Diego Alves is alert, though, and leaps like a salmon to deny him.
An opponent rises to his feet after being downed by Lionel Messi (Barcelona). Alberto Undiano Mallenco saw the sliding tackle and blows for a foul.
Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona) commits an ugly tackle on his opponent, but there is no caution from the referee.

Lionel Messi (Barcelona) receives a precise low pass inside the box, controls the ball and releases it towards the left post. Unfortunately for him, Diego Alves makes a great save to stop his effort. The referee blows his whistle, Barcelona are awarded a corner kick.
Barcelona are passing the ball across the pitch and keep possession. However, an opponent intercepts a pass and the situation changes.
A pass by Joao Cancelo (Valencia) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) picked up a yellow card from referee.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Diego Alves (Valencia) receives a yellow card from the referee for dissent.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Lionel Messi (Barcelona) finds the back of the net with a strike from the edge of the penalty box, with the ball finding the bottom right corner of the goal.
Mario Suarez (Valencia) commits a rough challenge and Alberto Undiano Mallenco blows his whistle for a foul.
So close! Lionel Messi (Barcelona) delivers a cross into the box, it almost finds the head of one of his teammates, but one of the defenders is quickest to the ball and coolly deals with the threat.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Alberto Undiano Mallenco shows a yellow card to Ezequiel Garay (Valencia) for a tough tackle.
The foul by Lucas Digne (Barcelona) was seen by Alberto Undiano Mallenco who didn't hesitate to blow the whistle.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Luis Enrique is forced to make a change. Andres Iniesta is not able to carry on due to injury. He is replaced by Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona).

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Andres Iniesta (Barcelona) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.
Martin Montoya (Valencia) deprives his opponent of the ball, but the referee blows his whistle for a foul. He's not happy with the decision!
Luis Suarez (Barcelona) and Lionel Messi attempt to exchange short two yard passes, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
Neymar (Barcelona) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Valencia take the corner, but their hopes of scoring a goal end with nice clearance by the defence.
Nani (Valencia) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out. Valencia have a corner.
Joao Cancelo (Valencia) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.
Neymar (Barcelona) sends a cross into the box, but the opposition's defence quickly intercepts the ball.
Nani (Valencia) sends a pass into the box, but his attempt is thwarted and cleared.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half has just begun.
Hello and welcome to our minute by minute commentary of the upcoming clash. We will try to provide you with as accurate as possible picture of the happenings on the pitch. Have fun.
Alberto Undiano Mallenco will officiate today.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: You can have a look at the starting XIs of both teams in the details of this match.
Neymar will look to add to his tally of 6 assists this season.
Lionel Messi is the biggest threat to an opponent! He has already scored 16 goals and is top scorer in this Barcelona team.
Valencia have lost 3x at home this season.

It was an attractive offensive game and the fans have no reason to be upset. You have to say that the visitors have been the better side. The home team adopted a defensive style of play, while the away team tried to prevail using combination football.
